Developer Terms of Use
des:
By linking up with Alexa, users of Diaz B.I. Wi-Fi Bridge (and motors) can now open or close blinds, venetians or other motorized window coverings by giving out direct voice commands to Alexa. 

You can ask Alexa to open or close individual shade or to activate a scene that moves a group of shades to pre-determined positions.

With the help of “Routine” feature in Alexa, you can create more native set of voice commands to activate a scene or perform group control. For example: you can say: “Alexa, it’s too dark” and link the command to a scene that opens all shades in the living room. 

A few tips for users: 
You will need to configure a Diaz B.I. Wi-Fi Bridge together with the Diaz B.I. App first before enabling the Alexa skill. 

Please create an account, setup rooms, devices/shades, scenes and timers properly in the Connector App, making sure a plain and distinctive name is assigned to rooms, shades, scenes and timers, for clear recognition with voice commands. 

To establish link-up with Alexa, you will be requested to submit Diaz B.I. account info, email address and password, to Alexa.

Alexa Routine feature is highly recommended.
